page.title: 17EDUCATION NEAR SEISDON
page.content: As there are no schools of any type in this block children of all ages have to travel some distance to school in various directions, depending in which county they live. Those in Staffordshire, mostly living in Seisdon itself, are taken by bus to Wombourne where there are schools for all age groups, though older children have an alternative cnoice in Kinver. The few children who live in the Shropshire half of the area have to be taken to school, the younger ones to Claverley and the rest to Bridgnorth, as there are no school buses for them. Further education is not available in the immediate area either and students have to travel to Bridgnorth, Wolverhampton or even to Stafford for this.
